name: Yellow Squash and Corn Saute
author: AuntE
summary: This is a pretty side dish that is tasty and a great way for using up summer squash and leftover corn on the cob.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place corn into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Place squash into a skillet and add water
Cook squash over medium heat until tender, 5 to 10 minutes
Drain any excess water from skillet
Stir corn, butter, parsley, salt, and pepper into squash; cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 5 minutes
